[@microsoft/fast-element](../fast-element/index.html) &gt; [css](../fast-element.css/index.html)

## css variable

Transforms a template literal string into styles.

**Signature:**

```typescript
css: CSSTemplateTag
```

## Remarks

The css helper supports interpolation of strings and ElementStyle instances.
